43821.summary: Customers in the Beverly area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43821.title: Nov 10 – Edmonton (Beverly)| All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
